Name: USS Cape Gloucester
Reclassified: Helicopter Carrier, CVHE-109, 12 June 1955, Cargo Ship and Aircraft Ferry, AKV-9, 7 May 1959
Displacement: 10,900 long tons (11,100 t) (standard), 24,100 long tons (24,500 t) (full load)[1]
Armament: 2 × 5 in (130 mm) guns (2×1), 36 × 40 mm AA guns
Part of: United States Pacific Fleet (1945-1946), Pacific Reserve Fleet (1946-1971)
